sections.headline: A dog grooming startup — made simple
sections.subhead: A clean, fast website built from natural language. Tell it what you want, and refine it like ChatGPT.

items.title: Natural language generation
items.body: Describe the site you want. The system generates structure, copy, and layout.

items.title: Chat-style refinement
items.body: Keep talking to refine sections, tone, layout, and visuals.

items.title: Revision history
items.body: Every change creates a revision you can preview and restore instantly.

items.name: Alex
items.quote: I shipped a landing page in minutes — then refined it like a conversation.

items.name: Sam
items.quote: The revisions make it easy to experiment without fear.

items.name: Jordan
items.quote: The output is clean and the workflow feels like ChatGPT.

items.q: Can I refine with natural language?
items.a: Yes. Just tell it what to change and it creates a new revision.

items.q: Do I lose my previous versions?
items.a: No. Revisions are saved and you can restore any one.
Yes. Export the current build as a zip.

sections.title: Contact
sections.body: Want a custom build or multi-page site? Reach out and we’ll help you ship.
